elevator.rmi.impl
Class PositionListener

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--elevator.rmi.impl.PositionListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener
public class PositionListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener

The helper class PositionListener that implements the java.awt.event.ActionListener interface for receiving action events from an the elevator timer and create an action event with a current position of one elevator with a given number or all elevators (special case). An object with the PositionListener class forwards the action events via RMI to a remote listener with the RemoteActionListener remote interface.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Vlad Vlassov, IMIT/KTH, Stockholm, Sweden
See Also:
ActionListener, ActionEvent
